EmailTemplate.name: Sales Prospecting
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Prospecting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Full_Name_Local__c},
My name is Ellie Schlaefer and I am contacting you as part of Illumina's effort [...]. Your contact information was obtained by Illumina from {!Contact.Recent_Prospecting_Tool__c} . The purpose of this email is [...].
Illumina values your right to choose to not receive any additional communication from us. Consistent with our privacy policy, by clicking this unsubscribe link, we will remove you from our contact list within 10 days of receipt of your unsubscribe request.
Thanks,
{!User.Name}
